Name: LU 773 - Zoning, 68-19 Woodhaven Boulevard Rezoning, Queens (C 200272 ZMQ)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 200272 ZMQ, a Zoning Map amendment (Preconsidered L.U. No. 773).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fnil\fprq2\fcharset0 TimesNewRomanPSMT;}{\f2\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Arial;}{\f3\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset0 Courier;}}
\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, 68-19 Rego Park, LLC,\expndtw-6  filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 14b, changing from an R4 District to an R6A District, changing from a C8-1 District to an R6A District, and establishing within the proposed R6A District a C2-3 District, which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the construction of a seven-story mixed-use building with community facility and commercial uses on the ground floor and approximately 87 residential units on the upper floors at 68-19 Woodhaven Boulevard in the Rego Park neighborhood of Queens, Community District 6 (ULURP No. C 200272 ZMQ) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on April 16, 2021, its decision dated April 7, 2021 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1440\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920 WHEREAS, the Application is related to application \f1 N 200273 ZRQ\f0  (Pre. L.U. No. 774), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on April 20, 2021;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued November 9\super th\nosupersub , 2020 (CEQR No. \f1 20DCP155Q\f0 ), which includes an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials and noise (E-589) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj  \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-589) and Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 200272 ZMQ, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further changed by the Zoning Map, Section No. 14b: \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li839\ri178\sb125\tx840 1.\tab changing from an R4 District to\expndtw-3  \expndtw0 an R6A\expndtw-1  \expndtw0 District\expndtw-1  \expndtw0 property bounded by a line midway between 68\super th\expndtw-1\nosupersub  \expndtw0 Avenue and 68\super th\nosupersub  Road, Alderton Street, 68\super th\nosupersub  Road, and a line\expndtw-1  \expndtw0 100 feet northeasterly of Woodhaven Boulevard;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li839\ri100\tx840 2.\tab changing from a C8-1 District\expndtw-1  \expndtw0 to an\expndtw-3  \expndtw0 R6A\expndtw-1  \expndtw0 District property bounded by a line\expndtw-1  \expndtw0 midway between 68\super th\expndtw-1\nosupersub  \expndtw0 Avenue and 68\super th\nosupersub  Road, a line 100\expndtw-2  \expndtw0 feet northeasterly of Woodhaven Boulevard,\expndtw-2  \expndtw0 68\super th\nosupersub  Road, and Woodhaven Boulevard; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li839\ri632\tx840 3.\tab establishing\expndtw-2  \expndtw0 within the proposed R6A\expndtw-1  \expndtw0 District\expndtw-1  \expndtw0 a C2-3 District\expndtw-1  \expndtw0 bounded by a line midway between 68\super th\nosupersub  Avenue and 68\super th\nosupersub  Road, a line 100 feet\expndtw-1  \expndtw0 southwesterly of Alderton Street, 68\super th\nosupersub  Road, and Woodhaven Boulevard;\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\f0 as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated November 16, 2020, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-589, Borough of Queens, Community District 6.\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\f3\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx5280\f0 Adopted.\tab\par
